name: Chicken
description:
Use the mouse to help the farmer return the chickens to the coop as fast as you can!

Chickens will run away if they see you trying to get them.

Hold the Left Mouse Button to quickly stop moving.

Concept Design:  KetrinaDrawsALot

Programming/Art/Sound:  AngryArugula

Music:  Unity Asset Store - Game Music Pack SUITE
